detail_desc: Biker jacket in imitation suede with a faux fur collar, diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a tab and press-stud at the sides of the hem. Faux fur lining.
Briefs in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with print motifs. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist, cap sleeves with scalloped edges and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Trousers in striped organic cotton bonded jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elasticated tops.

Shirt in soft Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Knee-length dress in a sturdy weave that is fitted at the top and has a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a very wide, flared skirt with pleats at the top. Lined at the top.
Fitted jumpsuit in sturdy jersey with velvet sections at the top, a V-neck with a decorative metal ring at the front, narrow shoulder straps and seam at the waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short, fitted skirt in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with sewn-on ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Padded parka with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a sewn-on faux fur trim that can be folded up, and a press-stud at the back. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with toggles at the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and visible zips in the sides. Quilted inner lining.
Top in soft jersey with short sleeves and a gentle flare to the hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in washed cotton twill with appliqués and printed text, and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short jacket in jersey containing glittery threads with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated hem. Jersey lining.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Small velvet shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener and a small inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x11x14 cm.
Metal earrings and ear cuffs decorated with plastic and glass beads. Four pairs of earrings that can be worn separately or together. Three ear cuffs.
Bras in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening and covered buttons at the top. Gathered seam at the waist and long, voluminous puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Metal hoop earrings with sparkly stones. Diameter 5.5 cm.
Two pairs of shorts in soft cotton twill, one pair with an all-over print. Elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim made partly from recycled cotton. Slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the front and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Silk briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with jersey-lined, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan in a fine-knit wool and recycled polyester blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey tops with a narrow shoulder straps, a racer back and elasticated hem.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a pleated stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longer-style, straight-cut jacket in stretch jersey with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a lace detail at the back and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

prod_name: All That Jazz Push Up Bra
detail_desc: Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that can be detached at the back, and a metal fastener at the back.
5-pocket trousers in imitation leather with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs with visible seams at the knees.

Cylindrical sports bag in woven fabric with a text print. Adjustable shoulder strap with a metal carabiner hook at one end, two handles and a zip at the top. Two mesh compartments on each short side and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size 25x40 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend. Width 34 cm, circumference 120 cm.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist and zip fly with a button. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front and fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in recycled mesh, and chunky soles.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and a round neckline with gathers at the front. Frill-trimmed hems and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.

Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. Extra-large, double-layered, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Quilted jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers and protect you from the wind. The jacket has a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip to keep your valuables safe. Outer fabric and padding made from recycled polyester. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with embroidery on the front, an adjustable elasticated waist and visible button fly.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a jacquard knit. Fleece-lined hat with a pompom on top, ear flaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details at the hem and short raglan sleeves with reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
Small, rainbow-shaped bag in soft faux fur with a zip at the top and shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 7x12x17 cm.

Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up- collar and hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and flap patch pockets. Concealed drawstring at the waist and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.

Suit trousers in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. The trousers have a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Fine-knit top with an X-cut at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a hole-patterned hem.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front and side.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof, functional fabric with imitation leather details and an ankle-height shaft with an elastic drawstring at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on trainers in grained imitation leather. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short, A-line skirt in grained imitation leather. Extended waistband with a button, a diagonal zip down the front, a zipped front pocket and a small, decorative flap with a press-stud at the front. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with short trumpet sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the bottom. Unlined.
